roles_and_responsibliies: Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter framework, leveraging Dart programming language.
Worked closely with UI/UX designers to translate design wireframes into high-quality, interactive user interfaces.
Collaborated with backend developers to design and implement API endpoints for seamless data exchange.
Optimized app performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks, resulting in faster loading times and improved user experience.
Actively participated in agile development processes, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
Stayed updated with Flutter's latest features, best practices, and community libraries to incorporate them into projects for enhanced functionality.
Assisted in designing and implementing user-friendly UI layouts following Material Design guidelines.
Debugged and resolved issues to improve app stability and performance.
Collaborated with senior developers to understand project requirements and deliver optimized solutions.
Gained hands-on experience in Android development tools like Android Studio and Firebase.
